thread.section_title: The Chess Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Quite "palace" near Opera
thread.title_full: Quite "palace" near Opera - Review of The Chess Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Alejandro O
title: Quite "palace" near Opera
text:
Above average for Paris standards: a quiet place in the middle of the city.
Pros:
Great location (near Opera, Boulevard des Italiens, cinemas, bars, etc), modern room equipment including big flat screen tv, nice room decoration, friendly staff, secret garden, free drink upon arrival, decent (though not extraordinary) breakfast, cute vintage, fixe line telephone, big enough bathroom (with its personalised line of beauty items), well-stuffed minibar, sensor-activated light in the wardrobe, enough electricity plugs in convenient places, free access to nearby fitness studio).
Cons:
The hotel entrance is all but charming, the lift works rather abruptly (good incentive to do some exercise and take the pleasant stairs), wifi signal was too weak for IP voice calls, double bed had two difference mattresses.
